comments.author: marcoos+bmo@marcoos.org
comments.raw_text:
The modify_title title string from toolkit/chrome/global/config.properties should be put inside the main window content, not in the title bar.

Current situation causes problems for locales with modify_title longer than the edited pref name on some platforms (pl + Linux).

Screenshot: http://bugs.aviary.pl/attachment.cgi?id=1610

The dialog itself is also not really readable this way. Sth like this could be much better, I think:

----------------------------------------------
| Enter preference value           [_][O][X] |
----------------------------------------------
|                                            |
| ( ? ) Enter string value for whateverpref: |
|       [__________________________________] |
|                                            |
|                              [OK] [Cancel] |
----------------------------------------------

http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/file/62157abe57bf/toolkit/locales/en-US/chrome/global/config.properties#l52

Original report in Polish bugzilla: http://bugs.aviary.pl/show_bug.cgi?id=3501
